forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High near 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with clearing overnight. Low 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the morning. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Periods of rain early. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 47F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 54F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 6C. NNE winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 42F. NNE winds at 10 to 20 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low around 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 12C. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 53F. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.
